articles.title: From puppies to superheroes, Chinese AI toys are bringing hugs — and hesitation - CNBC
articles.description: China's AI toy industry is growing as Beijing pushes companies and consumers to integrate the technology.
articles.content:
It seems everyone is talking about artificial intelligence these days even Ultraman. 
When asked if investors should be worried about an AI bubble, the new second-generation CocoMate AI-powered plus… [+2720 chars]

articles.title: Verizon refused to unlock man’s iPhone, so he sued the carrier and won - Ars Technica
articles.description: Verizon changed policy after he bought the phone, wouldn’t unlock it despite FCC rule.
